nodes.text: A masculine T-series military strategic analysis and tactics droid was the commander of a Separatist droid army during the Battle of Malastare during the Clone Wars. However, with the activation of the Republic's secret Electro-proton bomb, it and the droid army were destroyed.

This tactical droid was unique due to the fact that on its chest was a symbol resembling the Oxygen Destroyer from the Godzilla series, that was used to kill the creature in the original 1954 film. The Zillo Beast arc as a whole was actually a reference to the Godzilla series itself.
